# This is a true allow list with things
# that we really don't care about for django >= 5.0
# `allowlist_todo_django50.txt` is autogenerated by `stubtest --generate-allowlist`
# and might contain actual problems and things that we *do want* to fix.
#
# Please, move things here when you are sure that they really should be ignored.
# Comments about why things are ignored are mandatory.

# Lazy regex
django.utils.text.re_notag
django.utils.text.re_prt
